channel.title: Most popular plants on our platform
channel.description: Down below you can find a list of our most renowned plants on our botanical platform!

item.title: Jasmine
item.description: Scientific Name: Jasminum officinale Part of the Family: Oleaceae And the Genus: Jasminum Species of: officinale Collected at: China Popularity: 50 visits until now!

item.title: Chamomile
item.description: Scientific Name: Helianthus annuus Part of the Family: Asteraceae And the Genus: Matricaria Species of: chamomilla Collected at: Germany Popularity: 45 visits until now!

item.title: Sunflower
item.description: Scientific Name: Helianthus annuus Part of the Family: Asteraceae And the Genus: Helianthus Species of: annuus Collected at: USA Popularity: 30 visits until now!

item.title: Jasmine
item.description: Scientific Name: Jasminum Part of the Family: Jasminaceae And the Genus: Jasminum Species of: Jasminum sambac Collected at: Garden Popularity: 25 visits until now!

item.title: Mango
item.description: Scientific Name: Mangifera indica Part of the Family: Anacardiaceae And the Genus: Mangifera Species of: Mangifera indica Collected at: Orchard Popularity: 21 visits until now!

item.title: Basil
item.description: Scientific Name: Ocimum basilicum Part of the Family: Lamiaceae And the Genus: Ocimum Species of: Ocimum basilicum Collected at: Kitchen Popularity: 15 visits until now!

item.title: Aloe
item.description: Scientific Name: Aloe vera Part of the Family: Asphodelaceae And the Genus: Aloe Species of: Aloe vera Collected at: Home Popularity: 10 visits until now!

item.title: Rose
item.description: Scientific Name: Rosa Part of the Family: Rosaceae And the Genus: Rosa Species of: Rosa rubiginosa Collected at: Garden Popularity: 5 visits until now!
